title: Amazon.ae eGift Card - (Digital Delivery)
raw_desc: Amazon.ae Gift Cards carry no fees and expire 10 years from the date of issuance. Multiple gift card designs and denominations to choose from. Redeemable towards millions of items store-wide at Amazon.ae. Available for immediate delivery or schedule up to a year in advance. No returns and no refunds on Gift Cards, except as required by law.
features: Amazon.ae Gift Cards carry no fees and expire 10 years from the date of issuance.
